01:11:02","updatedTime":"2020-09-05 01:11:02","title":"The Best Movies On HBO, Ranked","link":"https://uproxx.com/?p=402501015","description":"\t<div class=\"featured-image\">\n\t\t<figure class=\"post-thumbnail\">\n\t\t\t<div class=\"upx-component upx-image\"><div class=\"image-holder\"><img width=\"1024\" height=\"450\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/contagion-matt-damon-top.jpg?w=1024&#38;h=450&#38;crop=1\" class=\"attachment-article-featured size-article-featured skip-lazy\" alt=\"contagion movie matt damon\" loading=\"lazy\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/contagion-matt-damon-top.jpg 1024w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/contagion-matt-damon-top.jpg?resize=300,132 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/contagion-matt-damon-top.jpg?resize=650,286 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/contagion-matt-damon-top.jpg?resize=768,338 768w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 640px) calc(100vw - 20px), (max-width: 1024px) calc(100vw - 40px), (min-width: 1025px) 1024px, 1024px\" /></div></div><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Warner Bros.</span></figcaption>\t\t</figure>\n\t</div>\n\t<p><strong>Last Updated: September 3rd</strong></p>\n<p>In addition to being America&#8217;s most trusted source of <em>Succession </em>episodes, HBO has a lovely collection of movies available ranging from trashy action thrills to elegant period pieces to star-studded comedies. With all the recent changes to HBO&#8217;s streaming services, though, it can be confusing to know what the heck is on which app. Here is a ranking of the 25 best movies on HBO (previously known as HBO Now) that you could and should be watching right now. We also rounded up <a href=\"https://uproxx.com/movies/best-movies-on-hbo-max/\">the best movies on HBO Max in another guide.</a></p>\n</p>\n<p><strong>Related: <a href=\"https://uproxx.com/movies/best-movies-on-hbo-max/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">The Best Movies On HBO Max Right Now</a></strong>\n<figure id=\"401374310\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-401374310\" src=\"http://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/jaws.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/jaws.jpg 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/jaws.jpg?resize=300,166 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/jaws.jpg?resize=196,110 196w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 650px) 100vw, 650px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Universal Pictures</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3 id=\"upxpos1\">1. <em>Jaws</em> (1975)</h3>\n<p><strong>Run Time: 124 min | IMDb: <a href=\"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0073195/?ref_=nv_sr_1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">8.0/10</a></strong></p>\n<p>With just a few bars on the piano and an oversized mechanical shark, Steven Spielberg terrorized generations of moviegoers with <em>Jaws</em>. The film follows a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer who team up to hunt a great white shark who has a worrisome bloodlust and seems to be targeting a small beach town during the busiest time of the year. Spielberg’s camera work &#8212; the lingering, underwater shots, the quick cuts of flesh being torn from bone and rows of teeth flashing to the surface &#8212; make this exercise in inciting aquaphobia even more chilling. You’ll never look at a carefree day at the beach the same way again.</p>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.hbo.com/movies/jaws\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Add To Watchlist</a> </strong></div>\n<figure id=\"400309278\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-400309278\" src=\"http://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/apocalypse-now.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/apocalypse-now.jpg 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/apocalypse-now.jpg?resize=300,180 300w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 650px) 100vw, 650px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">United Artists</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3>2. <strong><em>Apocalypse Now</em></strong><strong> (1979)</strong></h3>\n<p><strong>Run Time: 147 min | IMDb: <a href=\"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0078788/?ref_=nv_sr_2\">8.5/10</a></strong></p>\n<p>Francis Ford Coppola&#8217;s war epic starring Marlon Brando and Martin Sheen is a feat of filmmaking and a wild, gory ride. It&#8217;s basically a reinventing of Joseph Conrad&#8217;s <em>Heart of Darkness</em> &#8212; a truly bonkers novel &#8212; with the bloody conflict in the Congo being swapped out for the then-timely Vietnam War. Sheen plays Captain Benjamin Willard, an Army officer tasked with assassinating Brando&#8217;s Colonel Kurtz, a renegade Army officer accused of murder. Most of the film&#8217;s action centers on Sheen&#8217;s secret mission, his journey from Vietnam to Cambodia, and his showdown with Brando&#8217;s Kurtz, who&#8217;s been driven mad with power.</p>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.hbo.com/movies/apocalypse-now\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Add To Watchlist</a></strong></div>\n<figure id=\"401891253\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-401891253\" src=\"http://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/wintersbone-jpg.jpeg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/wintersbone-jpg.jpeg 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/wintersbone-jpg.jpeg?resize=300,168 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/wintersbone-jpg.jpeg?resize=150,85 150w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/wintersbone-jpg.jpeg?resize=328,185 328w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/wintersbone-jpg.jpeg?resize=387,218 387w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/wintersbone-jpg.jpeg?resize=460,259 460w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/wintersbone-jpg.jpeg?resize=196,110 196w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 650px) 100vw, 650px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Roadside</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3>3. <em>Winter’s Bone</em> (2010)</h3>\n<p><strong>Run Time: 100 min | IMDb: <a href=\"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1399683/?ref_=nv_sr_1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">7.2/10</a></strong></p>\n<p>A film noir set in the Ozarks of Missouri, <em>Winter&#8217;s Bone</em> was the breakthrough role for Jennifer Lawrence, who plays Ree Dolly, a 17-year-old who looks after her family since her father disappeared. With the looming threat of losing her home, Ree goes in search of her missing father, ending up in a world of distrust and violence. It was nominated for four Academy Awards, including Best Picture, and though it didn&#8217;t take any Oscars home, it did win the Grand Jury Prize at Sundance.</p>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.hbo.com/movies/winters-bone\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Add To Watchlist</a></strong></div>\n<p><!--pagetitle:--></p>\n<figure id=\"401990535\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-401990535\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/deadwood-the-movie-0.jpg\" alt=\"best movies on hbo go and hbo now\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/deadwood-the-movie-0.jpg 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/deadwood-the-movie-0.jpg?resize=300,166 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/deadwood-the-movie-0.jpg?resize=196,110 196w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 650px) 100vw, 650px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">HBO</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3>4. <em>Deadwood: The Movie </em>(2019)</h3>\n<p><strong>Run Time: 110 min | IMDb: <a href=\"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt4943998/?ref_=nv_sr_2?ref_=nv_sr_2\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">7.5/10</a></strong></p>\n<p>HBO managed to pull off the seemingly impossible with this follow-up movie based on a series that left us too soon. Ian McShane, Timothy Olyphant, and the rest of the residents of the camp are back to celebrate the South Dakota’s statehood in the only way this dusty drama knows how &#8212; with reignited rivalries, betrayals, bloodshed, and lots of swearin.’ The show became a fan favorite thanks to its gritty performances and nuanced storytelling, and the movie continues the tradition, investigating the lives of these pioneers who&#8217;ve endured plenty of hardship for their piece of the American dream.</p>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.hbo.com/movies/deadwood\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Add To Watchlist</a> </strong></div>\n<figure id=\"402285965\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-402285965\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/joker-dance-feat.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/joker-dance-feat.jpg 710w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/joker-dance-feat.jpg?resize=300,169 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/joker-dance-feat.jpg?resize=650,366 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/joker-dance-feat.jpg?resize=150,85 150w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/joker-dance-feat.jpg?resize=328,185 328w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/joker-dance-feat.jpg?resize=387,218 387w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/joker-dance-feat.jpg?resize=460,259 460w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/joker-dance-feat.jpg?resize=196,110 196w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 710px) 100vw, 710px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Warner Bros.</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3>5. <em>Joker</em> (2019)</h3>\n<p><strong>Run Time: 122 min | IMDb: <a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt7286456/?ref_=nv_sr_srsg_0\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">8.5/10</a></strong></p>\n<p>In case you didn’t catch it in theaters, or you just want to revisit the chaos and mayhem of Joaquin Phoenix’s troubled clown, Todd Phillips’ <em>Joker</em> is now on HBO Max. This gritty origin story imagines the DC supervillain as a mentally-ill clown-for-hire named Arthur, who spirals when his stand-up career turns sour, and he discovers some details about his lineage. Really, it doesn’t take much to put this guy over the edge.</p>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.hbo.com/movies/joker\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Add To Watchlist</a></strong></div>\n<figure id=\"402165249\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-402165249\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/alien.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/alien.jpg 1024w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/alien.jpg?resize=300,158 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/alien.jpg?resize=650,343 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/alien.jpg?resize=768,405 768w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">20th Century Fox</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3>6. <em>Alien</em> (1979)</h3>\n<p><strong>Run Time: 117 min | IMDb: <a href=\"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0078748/?ref_=nv_sr_srsg_0\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">8.4/10</a></strong></p>\n<p>Ridley Scott basically invented sci-fi horror with this alien thriller about a crew on a commercial space tug who must battle a violent extraterrestrial being that&#8217;s infiltrated their ship. Sigourney Weaver plays Ripley, an officer aboard the Nostromo, who&#8217;s forced to face down the titular Alien, an aggressive lifeform intent on killing the ship&#8217;s human crew. Most of the action revolves around Weaver&#8217;s attempts to destroy the creature and save her shipmates but it&#8217;s Scott&#8217;s direction behind the camera that creates the suspense and terror this film has become known for. </p>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.hbo.com/movies/alien\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Add To Watchlist</a> </strong></div>\n<figure id=\"attachment_402104709\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\"><img loading=\"lazy\" class=\"size-large wp-image-402104709\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/jojo-rabbit-0.jpg?w=650\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" height=\"360\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/jojo-rabbit-0.jpg 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/jojo-rabbit-0.jpg?resize=300,166 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/jojo-rabbit-0.jpg?resize=196,110 196w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 650px) 100vw, 650px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\"><a href=\"https://youtu.be/tL4McUzXfFI\" target=\"_blank\">Via Fox Searchlight</a></span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3>7. <em>Jojo Rabbit</em> (2019)</h3>\n<p><strong>Run Time: 108 min | IMDb: <a href=\"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt2584384/?ref_=nv_sr_srsg_5\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">7.9/10</a></strong></p>\n<p>Visionary director Taika Waititi gives us this World War II-set satirical masterpiece (and Oscar screenplay winner) that follows a young German boy, whose imaginary friend is Adolf Hitler. The kicker is that Waititi plays the genocidal maniac, making him a weak, comedic caricature of the infamous mass murderer, and as Jo Jo (a terrific Roman Griffin Davis) begins to bond with a Jewish girl hiding in his house, his worship of the dictator wanes in hilarious ways. Scarlett Johansson does some of her best work here as Jo Jo’s mother, a woman fighting to help the Jews, and Sam Rockwell steals every scene he’s in, playing a queer Nazi commander. Yet the joy and humor in this belongs to Davis, Thomasin McKenzie, and Archie Yates &#8212; the kids who give the film some much needed heart.</p>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.hbo.com/movies/jojo-rabbit\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Add To Watchlist</a> </strong></div>\n<figure id=\"1156684\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-1156684\" src=\"http://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/fight-club.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/fight-club.jpg 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/fight-club.jpg?resize=300,186 300w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 650px) 100vw, 650px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">20th Century Fox</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3>8. <em>Fight Club</em> (1999)</h3>\n<p><strong>Run Time: 139 min | IMDb: <a href=\"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0137523/?ref_=nv_sr_srsg_0\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">8.8/10</a></strong></p>\n<p>There are timeless classics and then there&#8217;s David Fincher&#8217;s exercise in understanding modern masculinity (a.k.a. Fight Club). The film has managed to remain relevant over the decades, with fans finding new themes and messages to dig into when it comes to Edward Norton&#8217;s depressed, unfulfilled office worker and his machismo friend, Tyler Durden (Brad Pitt). The two start an underground fight club &#8212; with a now-famous set of rules &#8212; and wreak havoc on the city as they let loose their aggression and search for the meaning in life. But it&#8217;s the film&#8217;s surprise, introspective ending that really elevates this bloody drama. </p>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.hbo.com/movies/fight-club\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Add To Watchlist</a> </strong></div>\n<figure id=\"1624351\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-1624351\" src=\"http://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/die-hard-bruce-willis.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/die-hard-bruce-willis.jpg 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/die-hard-bruce-willis.jpg?resize=300,185 300w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 650px) 100vw, 650px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Fox</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3>9. <em>Die Hard</em> (1988)</h3>\n<p><strong>Run Time: 132 min | IMDb: <a href=\"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0095016/?ref_=nv_sr_srsg_0\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">8.2/10</a></strong></p>\n<p>Bruce Willis stars in this action classic that gave birth to a genre-defining franchise. Willis plays John McClane, an NYPD officer tasked with rescuing his wife and children from a group of German terrorists who hold a Christmas gathering hostage at an LA hotel. Alan Rickman plays the group&#8217;s leader, and it&#8217;s his bad guy that makes this thing so enjoyable to watch. That, and Willis&#8217; iconic one-liners. </p>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.hbo.com/movies/die-hard\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Add To Watchlist</a></strong></div>\n<p><!--pagetitle:--></p>\n<figure id=\"401063007\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-401063007\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/the-tale1.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/the-tale1.jpg 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/the-tale1.jpg?resize=300,169 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/the-tale1.jpg?resize=150,85 150w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/the-tale1.jpg?resize=328,185 328w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/the-tale1.jpg?resize=387,218 387w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/the-tale1.jpg?resize=460,259 460w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/the-tale1.jpg?resize=196,110 196w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 650px) 100vw, 650px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Sundance</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3>10. <em>The Tale</em> (2018)</h3>\n<p><strong>Run Time: 114 min | IMDb: <a href=\"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt4015500/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">7.3/10</a></strong></p>\n<p>Laura Dern gives a hauntingly beautiful performance in Jennifer Fox&#8217;s autobiographical drama, <em>The Tale</em>. The film recounts Fox&#8217;s own history of sexual abuse at the hands of a riding instructor who was three times her age. Dern plays a grown-up version of Fox, a woman struggling to recall illicit memories of her past, to reconcile the relationship she thought she had as a teenager with a man old enough to be her father with what actually happened &#8212; years of grooming, mental, and physical abuse at the hands of adults she had put her trust in. It&#8217;s a brutal but necessary watch.</p>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.hbo.com/movies/the-tale\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Add To Watchlist</a></strong></div>\n\n<figure id=\"400632772\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-400632772\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/temple-grandin-film-images-5c886c0d-b03b-40f2-be5a-3a4c8dfa27c.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/temple-grandin-film-images-5c886c0d-b03b-40f2-be5a-3a4c8dfa27c.jpg 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/temple-grandin-film-images-5c886c0d-b03b-40f2-be5a-3a4c8dfa27c.jpg?resize=300,169 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/temple-grandin-film-images-5c886c0d-b03b-40f2-be5a-3a4c8dfa27c.jpg?resize=150,85 150w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/temple-grandin-film-images-5c886c0d-b03b-40f2-be5a-3a4c8dfa27c.jpg?resize=328,185 328w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/temple-grandin-film-images-5c886c0d-b03b-40f2-be5a-3a4c8dfa27c.jpg?resize=387,218 387w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/temple-grandin-film-images-5c886c0d-b03b-40f2-be5a-3a4c8dfa27c.jpg?resize=460,259 460w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/temple-grandin-film-images-5c886c0d-b03b-40f2-be5a-3a4c8dfa27c.jpg?resize=196,110 196w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 650px) 100vw, 650px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">HBO</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3 id=\"upxpos11\">11. <em>Temple Grandin</em> (2010)</h3>\n<p><strong>Run Time: 120 min | IMDb: <a href=\"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1278469/?ref_=nv_sr_4\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">8.3/10</a></strong></p>\n<p>Inspirational without being self-congratulatory or condescending, Mick Jackson&#8217;s <em>Temple Grandin</em> places Claire Danes in the role of the real-life title character as she develops into a voice in animal science that cannot be ignored. A world that&#8217;s unaccommodating to autism and women in the ranching industry does not make things easy for Grandin and Danes portrays her with detail, intelligence and heart. Bonus points awarded for having the courage to include comedy and taking the effort to make something with warmth. You don&#8217;t get that too often in movies featuring the inner workings of slaughterhouses.</p>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.hbo.com/movies/temple-grandin\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Add To Watchlist</a></strong></div>\n<figure id=\"402145238\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-402145238\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/gangs-of-new-york-jpg.jpeg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/gangs-of-new-york-jpg.jpeg 1024w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/gangs-of-new-york-jpg.jpeg?resize=300,173 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/gangs-of-new-york-jpg.jpeg?resize=650,376 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/gangs-of-new-york-jpg.jpeg?resize=768,444 768w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Miramax</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3>12. <em>Gangs of New York</em> (2002)</h3>\n<p><strong>Run Time: 167 min | IMDb: <a href=\"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0217505/?ref_=nv_sr_1?ref_=nv_sr_1\">7.5/10</a></strong></p>\n<p>Daniel Day-Lewis, Leonard DiCaprio, and Cameron Diaz star in Martin Scorsese&#8217;s historical epic that re-imagines the birth of New York City. DiCaprio plays Amsterdam, an Irish immigrant who returns to the Five Points years following his father&#8217;s murder, looking for revenge. To get it, he infiltrates Bill the Butcher&#8217;s (Lewis) gang, a group of proud natives tired of the influx of foreigners in their city. Diaz plays a prostitute who forms a relationship with Amsterdam as he befriends Bill, then struggles to follow-through with his plan to kill the man who murdered his father and lead the Five Points in a rebellion against the city&#8217;s elite.</p>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.hbo.com/movies/gangs-of-new-york\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Add To Watchlist</a> </strong></div>\n<figure id=\"402106982\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-402106982\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/boy-erased-nicole-kidman-700x430-jpg.jpeg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/boy-erased-nicole-kidman-700x430-jpg.jpeg 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/boy-erased-nicole-kidman-700x430-jpg.jpeg?resize=300,184 300w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 650px) 100vw, 650px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Focus Features</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3>13. <em>Boy Erased</em> (2018)</h3>\n<p><strong>Run Time: 115 min | IMDb: <a href=\"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt7008872/?ref_=nv_sr_1?ref_=nv_sr_1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">7/10</a></strong></p>\n<p>Nicole Kidman, Lucas Hedges, and Joel Edgerton star in this queer drama directed by Edgerton based off the memoir of author Garrad Conley. The film follows the son of a Baptist preacher (Hedges) who is outed to his strictly religious family and forced to undergo his church&#8217;s gay conversion therapy camp. There, he&#8217;s abused mentally and physically because of his queerness and his bonds with his family are tested.</p>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.hbo.com/movies/catalog.boy-erased\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Add To Watchlist</a></strong></div>\n<p><!--pagetitle:--></p>\n<figure id=\"400783754\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-400783754\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/mommydeadanddearest.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/mommydeadanddearest.jpg 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/mommydeadanddearest.jpg?resize=300,169 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/mommydeadanddearest.jpg?resize=150,85 150w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/mommydeadanddearest.jpg?resize=328,185 328w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/mommydeadanddearest.jpg?resize=387,218 387w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/mommydeadanddearest.jpg?resize=460,259 460w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/mommydeadanddearest.jpg?resize=196,110 196w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 650px) 100vw, 650px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">HBO</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3>14. <em>Mommy Dead And Dearest</em> (2017)</h3>\n<p><strong>Run Time: 82 min IMDb: <a href=\"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt6442978/?ref_=nv_sr_1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">7.4/10</a></strong></p>\n<p>Erin Lee Carr&#8217;s spellbinding crime doc <em>Mommy Dead and Dearest</em> plunges into the bizarre and absorbing true story surrounding the murder of Dee Dee Blanchard. It&#8217;s an absorbing, strange and disturbing watch that doles out enough jaw-dropping moments in 83 minutes to put full seasons of TV to shame. Sundance hopefuls would have a field day with the visuals in this documentary if they were to try and adapt this stranger-than-fiction tale of manipulation, murder, and motherhood.</p>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.hbo.com/documentaries/mommy-dead-and-dearest\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Add To Watchlist</a></strong></div>\n<figure id=\"402536513\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-402536513\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/film_queen_slim.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/film_queen_slim.jpg 1200w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/film_queen_slim.jpg?resize=300,169 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/film_queen_slim.jpg?resize=650,366 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/film_queen_slim.jpg?resize=768,432 768w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/film_queen_slim.jpg?resize=1024,576 1024w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/film_queen_slim.jpg?resize=150,85 150w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/film_queen_slim.jpg?resize=328,185 328w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/film_queen_slim.jpg?resize=387,218 387w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/film_queen_slim.jpg?resize=460,259 460w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/film_queen_slim.jpg?resize=196,110 196w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 1200px) 100vw, 1200px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Universal Pictures</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3>15. <em>Queen &#38; Slim</em> (2019)</h3>\n<p><strong>Run Time: 132 min | IMDb: <a href=\"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt8722346/?ref_=nv_sr_srsg_0\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">7.1/10</a></strong></p>\n<p>Daniel Kaluuya and Jodie Turner-Smith star in this Bonnie &#38; Clyde remix with a timely narrative twist. Penned by Lena Waithe, the story follows a Black couple whose first date turns deadly after a cop racially profiles Slim. The violent incident forces the two to go on the run, connecting with their pasts in unexpected ways and finding a deeper understanding of each other while fighting the system and trying to make it out alive. </p>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.hbo.com/movies/queen-and-slim\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Add To Watchlist</a></strong></div>\n<p><!--pagetitle:--></p>\n<figure id=\"402366125\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-402366125\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/kids-are-all-right.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/kids-are-all-right.jpg 800w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/kids-are-all-right.jpg?resize=300,168 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/kids-are-all-right.jpg?resize=650,365 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/kids-are-all-right.jpg?resize=768,431 768w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/kids-are-all-right.jpg?resize=150,85 150w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/kids-are-all-right.jpg?resize=328,185 328w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/kids-are-all-right.jpg?resize=387,218 387w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/kids-are-all-right.jpg?resize=460,259 460w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/kids-are-all-right.jpg?resize=196,110 196w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 800px) 100vw, 800px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Focus Features</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3>16. <em>The Kids Are All Right </em>(2010)</h3>\n<p><strong>Run Time: 106 min | IMDb: <a href=\"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0842926/?ref_=nv_sr_srsg_0\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">7/10</a></strong></p>\n<p>Annette Bening, Julianne Moore, Mark Ruffalo, and a handful of other embarrassingly talented actors carry this heartwarming family drama about two kids in search of their father. Josh Hutcherson and Mia Wasikowska play Laser and Joni, siblings conceived by artificial insemination. Their moms Jules (Moore) and Nic (Bening) each used the same sperm donor to have them and now, as the kids have grown up, they&#8217;ve become curious about this mystery paternal figure. Enter Ruffalo who plays a hippie restaurant owner named Paul that seems more interested in hooking up with Jules than getting to know his kids. It&#8217;s messy and difficult, but it&#8217;s a relatable story about unconventional family dynamics that feels refreshingly original. </p>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.hbo.com/movies/the-kids-are-all-right\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Add To Watchlist</a></strong></div>\n<figure id=\"402143088\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-402143088\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/moulin-rouge-jpg.jpeg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/moulin-rouge-jpg.jpeg 700w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/moulin-rouge-jpg.jpeg?resize=300,168 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/moulin-rouge-jpg.jpeg?resize=650,365 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/moulin-rouge-jpg.jpeg?resize=150,85 150w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/moulin-rouge-jpg.jpeg?resize=328,185 328w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/moulin-rouge-jpg.jpeg?resize=387,218 387w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/moulin-rouge-jpg.jpeg?resize=460,259 460w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/moulin-rouge-jpg.jpeg?resize=196,110 196w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 700px) 100vw, 700px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">20th Century Fox</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3>17. <em>Moulin Rouge </em>(2001)</h3>\n<p><strong>Run Time: 127 min | IMDb: <a href=\"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0203009/?ref_=nv_sr_1?ref_=nv_sr_1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">7.6/10</a></strong></p>\n<p>Baz Luhrmann&#8217;s bohemian rhapsody set in 1900s France follows the tale of a struggling writer who falls for a beautiful courtesan. Ewan McGregor plays Christian, a poet with grand ideas on love who move to the Montmarte district to write a novel and truly experience life. A trip to a pleasure theater called the Moulin Rouge introduces him to Satine (Nicole Kidman), a gorgeous performer who&#8217;s also caught the eye of a rich duke. Torn between her love for Christian and the trappings of her luxurious life, the pair embark on a forbidden romance that has disastrous consequences for everyone. </p>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.hbo.com/movies/moulin-rouge\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Add To Watchlist</a></strong></div>\n<figure id=\"400632782\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-400632782\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/rwhv.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/rwhv.jpg 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/rwhv.jpg?resize=300,183 300w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 650px) 100vw, 650px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Newmarket Films</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3>18. <em>Real Women Have Curves</em> (2002)</h3>\n<p><strong>Run Time: 93 min IMDb: <a href=\"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0296166/?ref_=nv_sr_1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">7/10</a></strong></p>\n<p>Living up to the immense hype it earned at Sundance that year, <em>Real Women Have Curves</em> is a coming-of-age tale that balances drama and comedy while shining a spotlight on the acting skills of future <em>Superstore</em> star America Ferrera. (The film marked the actress&#8217;s cinematic debut.) Ferrera plays Ana García, a young Mexican-American woman navigating cultural, societal and familial expectations in Los Angeles as she works toward her goal of heading to college. Smart, dignified and occasionally bittersweet, <em>Real Women Have Curves</em> is a movie unafraid of its warmth and humanity.</p>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.hbo.com/movies/catalog.real-women-have-curves\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Add To Watchlist</a></strong></div>\n<figure id=\"402136702\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-402136702\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/kevin-smith-clerks-jpg.jpeg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/kevin-smith-clerks-jpg.jpeg 1024w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/kevin-smith-clerks-jpg.jpeg?resize=300,174 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/kevin-smith-clerks-jpg.jpeg?resize=650,377 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/kevin-smith-clerks-jpg.jpeg?resize=768,446 768w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">VIEW ASKEW</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3>19. <em>Clerks</em> (1994)</h3>\n<p><strong>Run Time: 92 min | IMDb: <a href=\"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0109445/?ref_=nv_sr_1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">7.8/10</a></strong></p>\n<p>Kevin Smith&#8217;s slacker comedy has become a cult classic over the years. The premise of the film is pretty straight-forward: a guy working at a convenience store is called in on his day off and ends up having the shift from hell. Dead girlfriends, rooftop hockey games, attempted robberies, a breakup, and maybe even a life epiphany happen before the credits roll, but the real fun is in watching two dead-beats try their damndest to avoid work by getting into some sticky situations.</p>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.hbo.com/movies/clerks\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Add To Watchlist</a></strong></div>\n<p><!--pagetitle:--></p>\n<figure id=\"402130391\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-402130391\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/colin-farrell-in-bruges-jpg-jpeg.jpeg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/colin-farrell-in-bruges-jpg-jpeg.jpeg 710w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/colin-farrell-in-bruges-jpg-jpeg.jpeg?resize=300,199 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/colin-farrell-in-bruges-jpg-jpeg.jpeg?resize=650,432 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/colin-farrell-in-bruges-jpg-jpeg.jpeg?resize=150,100 150w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 710px) 100vw, 710px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Focus Features</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3>20. <em>In Bruges</em> (2007)</h3>\n<p><strong>Run Time: 107 min | IMDb: <a href=\"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0780536/?ref_=nv_sr_1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">7.9/10</a></strong></p>\n<p><em>In Bruges</em> was the movie that revealed Colin Farrell could be funny. A character actor stuck in a leading man’s body, Farrell gives arguably the best performance of his career as Ray, a rookie Irish hitman on the run with his partner and mentor, Ken (Brendan Gleeson), after accidentally killing a kid while executing a priest. While that may not sound much like the premise of a comedy, director Martin McDonagh crafted a truly hilarious movie. Farrell and Gleeson play off each other wonderfully all the way to the film’s dark finale. But as great as they are, they’re overshadowed at times by an incredible performance from Ralph Fiennes as their boss, Harry. Fiennes is at once funny and terrifying as a man steadfast in his principles, even when that involves committing murder.</p>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.hbo.com/movies/in-bruges\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Add To Watchlist</a> </strong></div>\n\n<figure id=\"401517562\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-401517562\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/a-star-is-born.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/a-star-is-born.jpg 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/a-star-is-born.jpg?resize=300,168 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/a-star-is-born.jpg?resize=150,85 150w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/a-star-is-born.jpg?resize=196,110 196w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 650px) 100vw, 650px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Warner Bros.</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3 id=\"upxpos21\">21. <em>A Star Is Born </em>(2018)</h3>\n<p><strong>Run Time: 136 min | IMDb: <a href=\"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1517451/?ref_=nv_sr_1?ref_=nv_sr_1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">7.7/10</a></strong></p>\n<p>Bradley Cooper’s directorial debut racked up plenty of awards earlier this year, and now you can finally find out why (if you haven’t seen it in theaters like pretty much everyone else already has). Cooper plays a washed-up musician who finds inspiration in a talented singer played by Lady Gaga. The two have a whirlwind romance sprinkled with fame, mentions of addiction and mental illness, but ultimately, it ends in tragedy. Still, the soundtrack is a banger.</p>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.hbo.com/movies/a-star-is-born\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Add To Watchlist</a></strong></div>\n<figure id=\"400632680\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-400632680\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/behind-the-candelabra-michael-douglas-matt-damon1-jpg.jpeg\" alt=\"\" width=\"649\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/behind-the-candelabra-michael-douglas-matt-damon1-jpg.jpeg 649w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/behind-the-candelabra-michael-douglas-matt-damon1-jpg.jpeg?resize=300,184 300w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 649px) 100vw, 649px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">HBO</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3>22. <em>Behind The Candelabra</em> (2013)</h3>\n<p><strong>Run Time: 118 min | IMDb: <a href=\"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1291580/?ref_=nv_sr_1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">7/10</a></strong></p>\n<p>It&#8217;d be rude for a Liberace-focused film not to be showered in sparkly awards upon release, don&#8217;t you think? Steven Soderbergh&#8217;s HBO Films take on Scott Thorson&#8217;s memoir <em>Behind the Candelabra: My Life with Liberace</em> earned Emmys galore for its blend of effective drama and dark comedy. Michael Douglas, Matt Damon, and Scott Bakula all scored well-deserved praise and trophies for their work in this gripping (and appropriately stylish) drama that will have you scrambling down many a Wikipedia rabbit hole after.</p>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.hbo.com/movies/behind-the-candelabra\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Add To Watchlist</a></strong></div>\n<p><!--pagetitle:--></p>\n<figure id=\"401592250\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-401592250\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/grey-gardens-jpeg.jpeg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/grey-gardens-jpeg.jpeg 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/grey-gardens-jpeg.jpeg?resize=300,168 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/grey-gardens-jpeg.jpeg?resize=150,85 150w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/grey-gardens-jpeg.jpeg?resize=328,185 328w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/grey-gardens-jpeg.jpeg?resize=387,218 387w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/grey-gardens-jpeg.jpeg?resize=460,259 460w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/grey-gardens-jpeg.jpeg?resize=196,110 196w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 650px) 100vw, 650px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">HBO</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3>23. <em>Grey Gardens</em> (2009)</h3>\n<p><strong>Run Time: 104 min | IMDb: <a href=\"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0758751/?ref_=nv_sr_2\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">7.5/10</a></strong></p>\n<p>Jessica Lange and Drew Barrymore star in this HBO remake of the 1975 documentary of the same name. Lange plays &#8220;Big Eddie,&#8221; aunt to former First Lady Jackie Kennedy, while Barrymore plays &#8220;Little Edie,&#8221; Kennedy&#8217;s first cousin. The two women became famous when it was revealed that their estate, Grey Gardens, was in ruin and they&#8217;d been living there in squalor for years. The film chronicles their journey to destitution, following &#8220;Little Edie&#8221; as she tries and fails to make a name for herself away from her mother while &#8220;Big Eddie&#8221; tries to prevent the end of her marriage. It&#8217;s a gripping, tragic tale, one made more visceral thanks to some stellar performances by Lange and Barrymore.</p>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.hbo.com/movies/grey-gardens\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Add To Watchlist</a></strong></div>\n<p><!--pagetitle:--><br />\n<figure id=\"402332838\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-402332838\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/contagion-matt-damon-feat.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/contagion-matt-damon-feat.jpg 710w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/contagion-matt-damon-feat.jpg?resize=300,169 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/contagion-matt-damon-feat.jpg?resize=650,366 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/contagion-matt-damon-feat.jpg?resize=150,85 150w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/contagion-matt-damon-feat.jpg?resize=328,185 328w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/contagion-matt-damon-feat.jpg?resize=387,218 387w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/contagion-matt-damon-feat.jpg?resize=460,259 460w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/contagion-matt-damon-feat.jpg?resize=196,110 196w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 710px) 100vw, 710px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Warner Bros.</span></figcaption></figure></p>\n<h3>24. <em>Contagion</em> (2011)</h3>\n<p><strong>Run Time: 106 min | IMDb: <a href=\"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1598778/?ref_=nv_sr_srsg_0\">6.7/10</a></strong></p>\n<p>It&#8217;s always surreal when life imitates art but watching Steven Soderbergh&#8217;s star-studded thriller during the age of Corona feels more like a warning than anything. That&#8217;s because Soderbergh approaches the film&#8217;s plot &#8212; a deadly virus originating in China ravages the planet forcing regular civilians and CDC workers to do the unthinkable in order to survive &#8212; with a methodical, scientific formula. There are real stakes, especially when we watch Matt Damon&#8217;s character scramble to save what&#8217;s left of his family or Laurence Fishburne fail to manage the crisis as a CDC head, but there&#8217;s also so much scientific jargon that this could be taught in schools. It probably should. </p>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.hbo.com/movies/contagion\">Add To Watchlist</a></strong></div>\n<figure id=\"400551993\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-400551993\" src=\"http://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/bridesmaids.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/bridesmaids.jpg 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/bridesmaids.jpg?resize=300,180 300w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 650px) 100vw, 650px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Universal</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3>25. <em>Bridesmaids</em> (2011)</h3>\n<p><strong>Run Time: 125 min | IMDb: <a href=\"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1478338/?ref_=nv_sr_srsg_4\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">6.8/10</a></strong></p>\n<p>Kristen Wiig and Maya Rudolph star in this raunchy comedy about a woman on the brink of marriage and her best friend who&#8217;s struggling through a series of failures in her life. Wiig plays Annie, a woman who lost her bakery and relationship in one fell swoop right before her friend Lillian (Rudolph) gets engaged. To make matters worse, there&#8217;s competition for the maid of honor spot when Lillian finds a new friend in the wife of her fiancé&#8217;s boss (played by the excellent Rose Byrne). Ruined bachelorette parties, Parisian wedding showers, and quite possibly the funniest, most disgusting poop explosion to ever happen on screen, quickly follow. </p>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.hbo.com/movies/bridesmaids\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Add To Watchlist</a></strong></div>\n<p><strong>Recent Changes Through September 2020:</strong><br />\nRemoved: <em>John Wick 3, Love, Actually</em><br />\nAdded: <em>Queen &#38; Slim, Clerks</em><br />\n</p>\n<div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a on-feat.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn74@2020_5/2020/09/04/17-11-19-009_8b212ff006568caa.webp","http://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/bridesmaids.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn53@2020_6/2020/09/04/17-11-23-214_72458f70b525a009.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn89@2020_5/2020/09/04/17-11-02-428_c8fa5e32ae89b18f.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?i=NtITRw8nADg:6ANIEBVVCxA:V_sGLiPBpWU":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn45@2020_2/2020/09/04/17-11-18-942_f1234b5e3acb72a6.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?d=7Q72WNTAKBA":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?i=NtITRw8nADg:6ANIEBVVCxA:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn39@2020_5/2020/09/04/17-11-19-507_4bcb850b04237d64.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/uproxx/features/~4/NtITRw8nADg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn61@2020_6/2020/09/04/17-11-18-236_c08121a0ddacb30c.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1599239462323},{"createdTime":"2020-09-05
