+0000","feedId":6617,"bgimg":"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/tampura-tfeat-uproxx.jpg?w=1600&h=495&crop=1","linkMd5":"b991a08688553365680a071a6b43563c","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn22@2020_3/2020/09/04/17-11-02-600_7962728854b47ede.webp","destWidth":1600,"destHeight":495,"sourceBytes":349660,"destBytes":349660,"author":"Vince Mancini","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/tampura-tfeat-uproxx.jpg?w=1600&h=495&crop=1":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn22@2020_3/2020/09/04/17-11-02-600_7962728854b47ede.webp","https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/LotusRootTempura.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn43@2020_3/2020/09/04/17-11-16-689_278e9ebee129671c.webp","https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/TempuraMushroom.jpg":null,"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/Onion-Tempura.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn24@2020_6/2020/09/04/17-11-16-625_b6cfda48916f0cb3.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn89@2020_5/2020/09/04/17-11-02-428_c8fa5e32ae89b18f.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?i=4DAsa8aZYAU:oVaHUsRTmwA:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn20@2020_4/2020/09/04/17-11-15-438_dc419309c6beec8f.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn45@2020_2/2020/09/04/17-11-18-942_f1234b5e3acb72a6.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?d=7Q72WNTAKBA":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?i=4DAsa8aZYAU:oVaHUsRTmwA:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn37@2020_3/2020/09/04/17-11-21-721_21c68d52c27788bc.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/uproxx/features/~4/4DAsa8aZYAU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn51@2020_6/2020/09/04/17-11-18-020_c2c60dd8d2a78fdc.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1599239462312},{"createdTime":"2020-09-05 01:11:02","updatedTime":"2020-09-05 01:11:02","title":"All The Major Fast Food Chains Serving Plant Based Meat In 2020","link":"https://uproxx.com/?p=402532368","description":"\t<div class=\"featured-image\">\n\t\t<figure class=\"post-thumbnail\">\n\t\t\t<div class=\"upx-component upx-image\"><div class=\"image-holder\"><img width=\"1600\" height=\"495\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/burger-tfeat-uproxx.jpg?w=1600&#38;h=495&#38;crop=1\" class=\"attachment-article-featured size-article-featured skip-lazy\" alt=\"\" loading=\"lazy\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/burger-tfeat-uproxx.jpg 1600w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/burger-tfeat-uproxx.jpg?resize=300,93 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/burger-tfeat-uproxx.jpg?resize=650,201 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/burger-tfeat-uproxx.jpg?resize=768,238 768w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/burger-tfeat-uproxx.jpg?resize=1024,317 1024w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/burger-tfeat-uproxx.jpg?resize=1536,475 1536w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 640px) calc(100vw - 20px), (max-width: 1024px) calc(100vw - 40px), (min-width: 1025px) 1024px, 1024px\" /></div></div><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">istock/uproxx</span></figcaption>\t\t</figure>\n\t</div>\n\t<p>It&#8217;s crazy to think that in <a title=\"\" href=\"https://uproxx.com/life/evolution-of-veggie-burger/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">just five years</a>, the Beyond and Impossible Burgers have gone from mere eco-conscious curiosities to fast food menu staples as the two brands continue to fight for dominance in the <a title=\"\" href=\"https://uproxx.com/life/del-taco-beyond-meat-taco-taste-test/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">American fast-food</a> space. In 2020, Beyond Meat has developed a considerable edge over Impossible Foods as the brand has become to go-to meat 2.0 choice of the majority of chains, but from a flavor standpoint? </p>\n<p>We&#8217;re a little <a title=\"\" href=\"https://uproxx.com/life/impossible-burger-vs-beyond-meat-burger-taste/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">more convinced</a> of Impossible&#8217;s <a title=\"\" href=\"https://uproxx.com/life/livestock-meat-and-dairy-major-contributors-climate-change/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">meat-mimicking power</a> over Beyond&#8217;s tech. Though we fully recognize that that is totally in the hands of who is preparing the thing. For instance, Umami Burger&#8217;s Impossible Burger and the Impossible Whopper couldn&#8217;t taste more different. That&#8217;s good news because both Beyond Meat and Impossible Foods are now more available at grocery stores than they&#8217;ve ever been, allowing you to put your own culinary stamp on a plant-based burger if fast food isn&#8217;t your thing.</p>\n<p>Regardless, we&#8217;ve got you covered if you&#8217;re enjoying more meals at home (due to COVID-19, this is all of us) with an updated list of all the markets and online stores, as well as nationwide fast-food joints holding both Beyond Meat and Impossible Foods. Now let&#8217;s get out there and eat some plants!</p>\n<h3><strong><a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.awrestaurants.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">A&#38;W</a></strong></h3>\n<div class=\"embed-holder\" style=\"--embed-ratio:100%;\"><iframe width=\"320\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://www.instagram.com/p/B03mRGQgxFv/embed/\" frameborder=\"0\"></iframe></div>\n<p>A&#38;W&#8217;s Beyond Burger was once a Canadian exclusive but is now available in the states at select <a title=\"\" href=\"https://awrestaurants.com/sites/default/files/A%26W%20Beyond%20Burger%20Locations.pdf\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">locations nationwide</a>. It&#8217;s probably not the tastiest Beyond Burger, but hey, now you can swig down some quality root beer while you eat a plant-based burger, and really, what more can you ask for?</p>\n<h3><strong><a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.bareburger.com/menu/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Bareburger</a></strong></h3>\n<div class=\"embed-holder\" style=\"--embed-ratio:100%;\"><iframe width=\"320\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://www.instagram.com/p/B0woy8kA4rn/embed/?utm_source=ig_embed\" frameborder=\"0\"></iframe></div>\n<p>Bareburger has a whole mess of Beyond Burgers and is by far the only burger chain on this list that is giving plant-based meat the spotlight it deserves. That standouts are The Original, a quarter-pound burger with American cheese, onions, pickles, and special sauce. The Golden State features gouda, green leaf lettuce, red onions, organic ketchup, and tomatoes. The Duchess has gouda, caramelized onions, wild mushrooms, baby kale, tomatoes, and organic garlic aioli. Then there are five other burgers you can dive into.</p>\n<p>Bareburger is <em>the</em> burger joint to hit up for all your well-dressed plant-based needs.</p>\n<h3><strong><a title=\"\" href=\"https://blazepizza.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Blaze Pizza</a> </strong></h3>\n<div class=\"embed-holder\" style=\"--embed-ratio:100%;\"><iframe width=\"320\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://www.instagram.com/p/BxSbB51HJXk/embed/\" frameborder=\"0\"></iframe></div>\n<p>Pizza is probably the easiest food to eat while totally avoiding meat. So, while we certainly didn’t need a vegan spicy chorizo topping option at Blaze Pizza, we’ll take it! </p>\n<h3><strong><a title=\"\" href=\"https://order.burgerfi.com/menu/vegefi-beyond-burger-more/vegefi-burger/5171108/customize\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">BurgerFi</a></strong></h3>\n<figure id=\"402534108\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-402534108\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Burgerfi.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Burgerfi.jpg 965w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Burgerfi.jpg?resize=300,372 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Burgerfi.jpg?resize=650,807 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Burgerfi.jpg?resize=768,953 768w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 965px) 100vw, 965px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">BurgerFi</span></figcaption></figure>\n<p>BurgerFi offers the best of both worlds, allowing you to have Beyond Meat in any of their burgers or a BurgerFi Veggie Patty for those looking for a more earthy taste. BurgerFi also offers Angus and Wagyu beef patties, in case you feel like dipping into the dark side for a bit. </p>\n<h3><strong><a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.bk.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Burger King</a></strong></h3>\n<figure id=\"401977375\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-401977375\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cc6f385b14bf44365207342-960-720.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cc6f385b14bf44365207342-960-720.jpg 960w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cc6f385b14bf44365207342-960-720.jpg?resize=300,225 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cc6f385b14bf44365207342-960-720.jpg?resize=650,488 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cc6f385b14bf44365207342-960-720.jpg?resize=768,576 768w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cc6f385b14bf44365207342-960-720.jpg?resize=632,474 632w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cc6f385b14bf44365207342-960-720.jpg?resize=536,402 536w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 960px) 100vw, 960px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Burger King</span></figcaption></figure>\n<p>Ahh, the Impossible Whopper. Not only have we tasted this thing, but we&#8217;ve <a title=\"\" href=\"https://uproxx.com/life/comparing-impossible-whopper-burger-king/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">examined how it stacks up</a> against its meat counterpart, the Original Burger King Whopper. Our verdict was that the burgers were essentially interchangeable. So if you&#8217;re looking to reduce your carbon footprint, this is an easy pick for any Burger King fan. </p>\n<h3><strong><a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.carlsjr.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Carl’s Jr.</a> </strong></h3>\n<div class=\"embed-holder\" style=\"--embed-ratio:100%;\"><iframe width=\"320\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://www.instagram.com/p/B_iS8fxhKpA/embed/\" frameborder=\"0\"></iframe></div>\n<p>Carl&#8217;s Jr. was one of the first big chains to embrace Beyond Meat with their Beyond Famous Star and Beyond BBQ Cheeseburger. Since those early days, Carl&#8217;s Jr. has also put together a Beyond Sausage Burrito and Beyond Sausage Egg and Cheese, making sure all your plant-based needs are covered through breakfast, lunch, or dinner. </p>\n<h3><strong><a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.thecheesecakefactory.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">The Cheesecake Factory</a> </strong></h3>\n<div class=\"embed-holder\" style=\"--embed-ratio:100%;\"><iframe width=\"320\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://www.instagram.com/p/B29tMPfjwcs/embed/\" frameborder=\"0\"></iframe></div>\n<p>Just when you thought the Cheesecake Factory menu was overdone, they decided to add yet another item to their &#8220;A Song of Ice and Fire&#8221; sized list of offerings. Are <em>Game of Thrones</em> references officially dated? The Cheesecake Factory Impossible Burger has been sold nationwide since August of 2018. Why they didn’t take this opportunity to introduce the Impossible Meatcake we’ll never understand. But we&#8217;re holding our breath in anticipation!</p>\n<h3><strong><a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.chronictacos.com/menu\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Chronic Taco</a></strong></h3>\n<div class=\"embed-holder\" style=\"--embed-ratio:100%;\"><iframe width=\"320\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://www.instagram.com/p/B0UDXawHY9E/embed/?utm_source=ig_embed\" frameborder=\"0\"></iframe></div>\n<p>Chronic Taco has a Beyond Beef Crumble that can be ordered in any one of their tacos, burritos, or bowls. They also serve a potato taco which is a delicious and traditional Mexican-food option that edges out the Beyond in my humble opinion. The Beyond Beef Crumble is vegan-friendly, gluten and soy-free, and packs a whopping 55 grams of protein and only 3 grams of fat. Now, you’ll just have to convince your friends to eat at a place called Chronic Taco.</p>\n<h3><strong><a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.deltaco.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Del Taco</a></strong></h3>\n<div class=\"embed-holder\" style=\"--embed-ratio:100%;\"><iframe width=\"320\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://www.instagram.com/p/CDy5Fw0lmvt/embed/\" frameborder=\"0\"></iframe></div>\n<p>Del Taco now serves Beyond Meat tacos at all 580 of their locations across the country. <a title=\"\" href=\"https://uproxx.com/life/del-taco-beyond-meat-taco-taste-test/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">We’ve tried it</a>. It certainly tastes meat-ish! Order a taco, burrito, or nachos and substitute Beyond Meat for real meat. Pro-tip: Order a Beyond Meat soft taco, fill that baby up with some crinkle-cut fries and you’ve got yourself a flavor bomb! </p>\n<h3><strong><a title=\"\" href=\"https://disneyland.disney.go.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Disney Parks</a></strong></h3>\n<div class=\"embed-holder\" style=\"--embed-ratio:100%;\"><iframe width=\"320\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://www.instagram.com/p/CEjWUgtjYU5/embed/\" frameborder=\"0\"></iframe></div>\n<p>Disney World serves “grilled vegetarian burgers” park-wide and at several restaurants operating on the premises. Whether you’re grabbing an Impossible burger at the House of Blues or a more generic variation somewhere in the Epcot Center, the world of Disney has got us covered in terms of plant-based burgers. They’ll probably be the most expensive plant-based burgers you’ll ever buy, which will pair nicely with your expensive churro. </p>\n<h3><strong><a title=\"\" href=\"https://doghaus.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Doghaus</a></strong></h3>\n<div class=\"embed-holder\" style=\"--embed-ratio:100%;\"><iframe width=\"320\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://www.instagram.com/p/B1MXR1HBnh5/embed/?utm_source=ig_embed\" frameborder=\"0\"></iframe></div>\n<p>Doghaus saw the war plant-based meat wars and decided, “Nah, we ain’t picking sides.” As far as we can tell, Doghaus is the only chain to serve both meat 2.0 brands, thanks to their Impossible Burger and Beyond Sausage Dog. It&#8217;s the best of both worlds in the Doghaus.</p>\n<h3><strong><a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.dunkindonuts.com/en\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Dunkin’</a></strong></h3>\n<div class=\"embed-holder\" style=\"--embed-ratio:100%;\"><iframe width=\"320\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://www.instagram.com/p/B0TzJsehr0T/embed/\" frameborder=\"0\"></iframe></div>\n<p>Originally a Manhattan exclusive, the Dunkin&#8217; Beyond Sausage breakfast sandwich is now available nationwide. It looks almost identical to a regular breakfast sausage sandwich, only the meat is made from plants! How neat. Accompanying the Beyond Sausage patty are egg and aged white cheddar cheese, so, sorry vegans!</p>\n<h3><strong><a title=\"\" href=\"https://fatburger.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Fatburger</a></strong></h3>\n<div class=\"embed-holder\" style=\"--embed-ratio:100%;\"><iframe width=\"320\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://www.instagram.com/p/B-KZ6-MoISq/embed/\" frameborder=\"0\"></iframe></div>\n<p>If you’re a big Fatburger fan, you probably already know that they&#8217;re selling an Impossible Fatburger. The Impossible Fatburger is currently available at every Fatburger location in America with some locations even carrying vegan Daiya cheese. Bump that Daiya access to all locations Fatburger and you may just win the plant-based burger war!</p>\n<h3><strong><a title=\"\" href=\"http://www.hardrock.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Hard Rock Cafe</a> </strong></h3>\n<div class=\"embed-holder\" style=\"--embed-ratio:100%;\"><iframe width=\"320\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://www.instagram.com/p/Bn4PkZ_FVdc/embed/\" frameborder=\"0\"></iframe></div>\n<p>Since December of last year, the Hard Rock Cafe has been serving the Impossible Burger at all 40 company-owned locations in the United States. What tastes better than an Impossible Burger with double cheese and a giant fried <a href=\"https://uproxx.com/life/onion-ring-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">onion ring</a> inside of it? Don’t answer that, because the answer is &#8220;a beef burger with double cheese and a giant friend onion ring.&#8221; But the planet is in trouble, so it might not be a bad idea to start thinking of ways you can help.</p>\n<h3><strong><a title=\"\" href=\"https://littlecaesars.com/en-us/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Little Caesars</a></strong></h3>\n<figure id=\"401977369\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-401977369\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/tl-horizontal_main_2x.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/tl-horizontal_main_2x.jpg 1280w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/tl-horizontal_main_2x.jpg?resize=300,203 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/tl-horizontal_main_2x.jpg?resize=650,441 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/tl-horizontal_main_2x.jpg?resize=768,521 768w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/tl-horizontal_main_2x.jpg?resize=1024,694 1024w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/tl-horizontal_main_2x.jpg?resize=190,130 190w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 1280px) 100vw, 1280px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Little Caesars</span></figcaption></figure>\n<p>Little Caesars is trying out a Supreme Pizza made in collaboration with Impossible Meats. The Impossible Supreme Pizza consists of caramelized onions, mushrooms, green pepper, and Impossible Sausage, which the meat 2.0 company made especially for Little Caesars. </p>\n<p>Blaze Pizza, take note, this is how you go meatless!</p>\n<p>This has yet to roll out nationwide, but Little Caesars CEO David Scrivano indicated to <em><a title=\"\" href=\"https://cheddar.com/media/little-caesars-ceo-talks-delivery-impossible-foods-and-ghost-kitchens#:~:text=Little%20Caesars%20is%20bringing%20its,works%20through%20the%20company's%20app.\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Cheddar</a></em> that a nationwide rollout is likely after the test markets responded well. Currently, this is only available at test markets in Yakima, Washington, Fort Meyers, Florida, and Albuquerque, New Mexico. </p>\n<h3><strong><a title=\"\" href=\"https://lunagrill.com/menu/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Luna Grill</a></strong></h3>\n<div class=\"embed-holder\" style=\"--embed-ratio:100%;\"><iframe width=\"320\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://www.instagram.com/p/CAwBRoCoOZ-/embed/\" frameborder=\"0\"></iframe></div>\n<p>Texas and California Mediterranean chain restaurant Luna Grill has a Beyond Burger served with grilled red onions, shredded kale, diced tomatoes, and a mouth-water spicy feta cheese sauce. Delicious!</p>\n<h3><strong><a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">McDonald&#8217;s</a></strong></h3>\n<figure id=\"401977399\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-401977399\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb125a021b4c55c80cef0d-1920-1440.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb125a021b4c55c80cef0d-1920-1440.jpg 1920w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb125a021b4c55c80cef0d-1920-1440.jpg?resize=300,225 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb125a021b4c55c80cef0d-1920-1440.jpg?resize=650,488 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb125a021b4c55c80cef0d-1920-1440.jpg?resize=768,576 768w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb125a021b4c55c80cef0d-1920-1440.jpg?resize=1024,768 1024w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb125a021b4c55c80cef0d-1920-1440.jpg?resize=1536,1152 1536w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb125a021b4c55c80cef0d-1920-1440.jpg?resize=1832,1374 1832w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb125a021b4c55c80cef0d-1920-1440.jpg?resize=1376,1032 1376w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb125a021b4c55c80cef0d-1920-1440.jpg?resize=1044,783 1044w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb125a021b4c55c80cef0d-1920-1440.jpg?resize=632,474 632w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb125a021b4c55c80cef0d-1920-1440.jpg?resize=536,402 536w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 1920px) 100vw, 1920px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">McDonald</span></figcaption></figure>\n<p>Okay, what gives McDonald’s? Americans often gaze at the <a title=\"\" href=\"https://uproxx.com/life/mc-donalds-international-menu/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">international menu</a> offerings from McDonald’s with envy but this is just taking it too far. The <a href=\"https://uproxx.com/life/big-vegan-ts-burger-taste-test-mcdonalds/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Big Vegan TS</a> is currently only available in the fast-food chain’s German market with no plans to expand to the US. While that’s pretty disappointing, we doubt it means we’ll never get a meat 2.0 Big Mac stateside, considering the Big Vegan TS is manufactured by Nestlé which leaves the door wide open for Impossible or Beyond Meats to come sweeping in to rescue us.</p>\n<h3><strong><a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.qdoba.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Qdoba</a></strong></h3>\n<figure id=\"401977372\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-401977372\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb10cd021b4c51f85bda5b-1536-1152.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb10cd021b4c51f85bda5b-1536-1152.jpg 1536w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb10cd021b4c51f85bda5b-1536-1152.jpg?resize=300,225 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb10cd021b4c51f85bda5b-1536-1152.jpg?resize=650,488 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb10cd021b4c51f85bda5b-1536-1152.jpg?resize=768,576 768w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb10cd021b4c51f85bda5b-1536-1152.jpg?resize=1024,768 1024w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb10cd021b4c51f85bda5b-1536-1152.jpg?resize=1376,1032 1376w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb10cd021b4c51f85bda5b-1536-1152.jpg?resize=1044,783 1044w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb10cd021b4c51f85bda5b-1536-1152.jpg?resize=632,474 632w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb10cd021b4c51f85bda5b-1536-1152.jpg?resize=536,402 536w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 1536px) 100vw, 1536px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Qdoba</span></figcaption></figure>\n<p>Qdoba now sells Impossible Tacos and Bowls at all 730 of its locations. I’d argue that the meat 2.0 tacos are actually considerably better than the burgers. So if you’ve been burned by an Impossible or Beyond burger in the past, consider giving the tacos a try.</p>\n<h3><strong><a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.redrobin.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Red Robin</a></strong></h3>\n<figure id=\"401977371\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-401977371\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdc13f4021b4c0af25bb8a7-960-720.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdc13f4021b4c0af25bb8a7-960-720.jpg 960w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdc13f4021b4c0af25bb8a7-960-720.jpg?resize=300,225 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdc13f4021b4c0af25bb8a7-960-720.jpg?resize=650,488 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdc13f4021b4c0af25bb8a7-960-720.jpg?resize=768,576 768w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdc13f4021b4c0af25bb8a7-960-720.jpg?resize=632,474 632w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdc13f4021b4c0af25bb8a7-960-720.jpg?resize=536,402 536w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 960px) 100vw, 960px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Red Robin</span></figcaption></figure>\n<p>Red Robin first introduced their Impossible Burger on April Fools’ Day of this year. Why any company does anything on April Fools’ Day is beyond us, but the Red Robin Impossible Burger is no joke. The best part about the chain’s approach is that you could swap in the Impossible Burger patty to any of Red Robin’s gourmet burgers. That&#8217;s dope and an approach we’d like to see more chains take up in regards to the meat substitute. </p>\n<h3><strong><a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.shakeshack.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Shake Shack</a></strong></h3>\n<div class=\"embed-holder\" style=\"--embed-ratio:100%;\"><iframe width=\"320\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://www.instagram.com/p/Bs1SwPFg72P/embed/\" frameborder=\"0\"></iframe></div>\n<p>The Shake Shack ’Shroom Burger consists of a portobello mushroom cap with Muenster and cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and Shack Sauce. While it&#8217;s not quite an Impossible or Beyond meat, it still deserves some mention. The ‘Shroom Burger is by no means bad, they’re actually pretty tasty but they don’t exactly satiate that meat craving like an Impossible or Beyond Burger might. Still, Mushrooms <em>do</em> have a meaty texture with lots of umami, so it’s almost there.</p>\n<p>Shake Shack also has a Veggie burger that is exclusive through their app but only from limited locations. So we aren&#8217;t counting it. Get it together Shake Shack!</p>\n<h3><strong><a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.beyondmeat.com/whats-new/subway-and-beyond-meat-team-up/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Subway</a></strong></h3>\n<div class=\"embed-holder\" style=\"--embed-ratio:100%;\"><iframe width=\"320\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://www.instagram.com/p/B8CxBBiBXro/embed/\" frameborder=\"0\"></iframe></div>\n<p>The Beyond Meatball Marinara Sub has everything you love about the classic Subway sandwich only with a ball of plant-based meat instead of, you know, meat. Packed with 24 grams of protein per six inches, the Beyond Meatball Marinara Sub will leave you just as satisfied as it&#8217;s hearty meatball counterpart, all while slightly reducing your own carbon footprint. That&#8217;s a win-win. </p>\n<h3><strong><a title=\"\" href=\"https://locations.tgifridays.com/search.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">TGI Fridays</a></strong></h3>\n<figure id=\"401977416\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-401977416\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb11db021b4c6f212e94c2-1920-1440.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb11db021b4c6f212e94c2-1920-1440.jpg 1920w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb11db021b4c6f212e94c2-1920-1440.jpg?resize=300,225 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb11db021b4c6f212e94c2-1920-1440.jpg?resize=650,488 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb11db021b4c6f212e94c2-1920-1440.jpg?resize=768,576 768w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb11db021b4c6f212e94c2-1920-1440.jpg?resize=1024,768 1024w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb11db021b4c6f212e94c2-1920-1440.jpg?resize=1536,1152 1536w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb11db021b4c6f212e94c2-1920-1440.jpg?resize=1832,1374 1832w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb11db021b4c6f212e94c2-1920-1440.jpg?resize=1376,1032 1376w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb11db021b4c6f212e94c2-1920-1440.jpg?resize=1044,783 1044w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb11db021b4c6f212e94c2-1920-1440.jpg?resize=632,474 632w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb11db021b4c6f212e94c2-1920-1440.jpg?resize=536,402 536w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 1920px) 100vw, 1920px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">TGI Fridays</span></figcaption></figure>\n<p>Since January 2018 people have been “thanking God” that TGI Fridays has a Beyond Burger. Bad joke? Just stop your criticism and eat your Beyond burger. At over 469 participating locations nationwide, you could substitute the beef patty in any TGI Fridays burger for Beyond Meat.</p>\n<h3><a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.umamiburger.com/menu/#menu=burgers\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"><strong>Umami Burger</strong></a></h3>\n<div class=\"embed-holder\" style=\"--embed-ratio:100%;\"><iframe width=\"320\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://www.instagram.com/p/Bw5kmgTlaPz/embed/\" frameborder=\"0\"></iframe></div>\n<p>Umami Burger was one of the first burger spots to offer up an Impossible Burger and the small chain currently has three different iterations of the burger on their menu. With the Impossible Trufflemaker, you get an all-vegan bun, miso mustard sauce, charred green chili salsa, truffle fondue, truffle aioli, port wine, a truffle glaze, curly lettuce, and tomato. If that doesn’t make your mouth water and fill you with ideas of eating way less meat, we don’t know what will. </p>\n<p>Or perhaps the Impossible Vegan BBQ is more your speed, with an espresso rub, smokey bbq sauce, and thinly sliced jalapeño with the aforementioned miso mustard and charred green chili salsa. With ingredients like that the meat doesn’t even matter!</p>\n<h3><strong><a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.veggiegrill.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Veggie Grill</a></strong></h3>\n<div class=\"embed-holder\" style=\"--embed-ratio:100%;\"><iframe width=\"320\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://www.instagram.com/p/B3p23KrgsVE/embed/?utm_source=ig_embed\" frameborder=\"0\"></iframe></div>\n<p>If you’re already living a vegan or vegetarian lifestyle, you probably already know all about Veggie Grill. If you’re new or interested in becoming vegan or vegetarian, welcome to your new McDonald&#8217;s. Veggie Grill is a fast-casual vegan restaurant, their entire menu is vegan friendly and they have plenty of plant-based meat products on their menu, from Beyond Cheesesteak Sandwiches to chopped Chickin’ salads.</p>\n<h3><strong><a title=\"\" href=\"https://wahlburgers.com/food-menu\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Wahl Burger</a></strong></h3>\n<div class=\"embed-holder\" style=\"--embed-ratio:100%;\"><iframe width=\"320\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://www.instagram.com/p/B3C1ocalggI/embed/?utm_source=ig_embed\" frameborder=\"0\"></iframe></div>\n<p>Wahl Burger, the only burger chain partly owned by a member of the Funky Bunch, proudly serves a quarter-pound Impossible Burger with smoked cheddar cheese, lettuce, caramelized onions, Paul’s signature Wahl sauce, and some housemade chili-spiced tomatoes. It’s such a good vibration, it’s such a sweet sensation.</p>\n<h3><strong><a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.whitecastle.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">White Castle</a></strong></h3>\n<figure id=\"401977376\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-401977376\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb1238021b4c507c5224d8-1920-1440.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb1238021b4c507c5224d8-1920-1440.jpg 1920w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb1238021b4c507c5224d8-1920-1440.jpg?resize=300,225 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb1238021b4c507c5224d8-1920-1440.jpg?resize=650,488 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb1238021b4c507c5224d8-1920-1440.jpg?resize=768,576 768w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb1238021b4c507c5224d8-1920-1440.jpg?resize=1024,768 1024w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb1238021b4c507c5224d8-1920-1440.jpg?resize=1536,1152 1536w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb1238021b4c507c5224d8-1920-1440.jpg?resize=1832,1374 1832w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb1238021b4c507c5224d8-1920-1440.jpg?resize=1376,1032 1376w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb1238021b4c507c5224d8-1920-1440.jpg?resize=1044,783 1044w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb1238021b4c507c5224d8-1920-1440.jpg?resize=632,474 632w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/5cdb1238021b4c507c5224d8-1920-1440.jpg?resize=536,402 536w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 1920px) 100vw, 1920px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">White Castle</span></figcaption></figure>\n<p>White Castle has been selling an Impossible version of their 2&#215;2 inch slider at participating locations nationwide for about a year now. Since every stoner’s favorite East Coast burger chain was such an early adopter of Impossible, it has given the company some time to start experimenting with the slider. This past April, White Castle introduced the BBQ Impossible Slider, and though we haven’t had one we imagine it’s now even harder for meat 2.0 skeptics to tell the difference.</p>\n<h3><strong><a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.yardhouse.com/home\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Yard House</a></strong></h3>\n<div class=\"embed-holder\" style=\"--embed-ratio:100%;\"><iframe width=\"320\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://www.instagram.com/p/B3FyWSGHDqz/embed/\" frameborder=\"0\"></iframe></div>\n<p>America’s favorite sports bar chain, Yard House, is home to the unimaginatively named “Beyond Burger,” featuring pickles, vegan mozzarella, red onions, tomato, arugula, smashed avocado, and a slaw made from mixed field greens tossed in balsamic vinaigrette atop a fresh-baked onion bun. Nice call on the arugula over something like butter lettuce, but we’re still feeling salty over the name.</p>\n<h3><strong>All The Markets Selling Beyond and Impossible Meat</strong></h3>\n<p>If you love yourself a plant-based burger so much that you’re looking to swap out meat for a Beyond or Impossible product permanently, you’ll be pleased to know that they have this stuff in markets too! With sausage, chicken, and taco meat plant-based products, swapping out meat for something altogether better for the environment is now easier than ever. </p>\n<p>In terms of availability, Beyond is absolutely mopping the floor with Impossible, with availability at 26 grocery stores chains across the country compared to Impossible’s presence in just three. This is a large disparity that’ll leave Impossible fans vulnerable to being swooped up by Beyond’s convenience. Step it up Impossible Foods!</p>\n<p>Beyond Meat products can be found at <a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.acmestores.com/product/00852629004583/beyond-meat-the-beyond-burger-plant-based-bur\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">ACME</a>, <a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.albertsons.com/shop/search-results.html?q=beyond%20meat\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Albertsons</a>, <a title=\"\" href=\"https://shop.foodlion.com/search?search_term=beyond%20meat\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Food Lion</a>, <a title=\"\" <a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.harristeeter.com/search?query=beyond%20meat\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Harris Teeter</a>, <a title=\"\" noreferrer\">Jewel-Osco</a>, <a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.kroger.com/search?query=beyond%20meat&#38;searchType=natural\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Kroger</a>, <a title=\"\" noreferrer\">Pavilions</a>, <a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.ralphs.com/search?query=beyond%20meat&#38;searchType=natural\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Ralphs</a>, <a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.safeway.com/shop/search-results.html?q=beyond%20meat&#38;zipcode=94612&#38;r=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.safeway.com%2Fhome.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Safeway</a>, <a title=\"\" href=\"https://secure.shoprite.com/User/SignIn/3601\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">ShopRit</a>e, <a title=\"\" href=\"https://shop.sprouts.com/search?search_term=beyond%20meat\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Sprouts Farmers Market</a>, <a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.staterbros.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Stater Bros Market</a>, <a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.target.com/s?searchTerm=beyond+meat&#38;Nao=0\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Target</a>, <a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.vons.com/shop/search-results.html?q=beyond%20meat&#38;zipcode=92107&#38;r=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.vons.com%2Fhome.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Vons,</a> <a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.walmart.com/search/?query=beyond%20meat\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Walmart</a>, and <a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.wholefoodsmarket.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Whole Foods</a></p>\n<p>Impossible Foods can be found at <a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.fairwaymarket.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Fairway Market</a>, <a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.gelsons.com/about/news-and-events/press-releases/impossible-foods-makes-global-grocery-store-debut-at-gelsons.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Gelson’s</a>, and <a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.wegmans.com/products/natures-marketplace/frozen-foods/plant-based-protein/patties-plant-based.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Wegmans</a>.</p>\n<p><a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.beyondmeat.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Beyond Meat</a> and <a title=\"\" href=\"https://buy.impossiblefoods.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Impossible Foods</a> also have online stores where shoppers can order exclusive products and have them delivered right to their door.</p>\n<div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?a=ZABk3PZiYpw:AucFETuarTo:qj6IDK7rITs\"><img 20_6/2020/09/04/17-11-21-773_152d4b9412e7618b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn89@2020_5/2020/09/04/17-11-02-428_c8fa5e32ae89b18f.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?i=ZABk3PZiYpw:AucFETuarTo:V_sGLiPBpWU":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn45@2020_2/2020/09/04/17-11-18-942_f1234b5e3acb72a6.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?d=7Q72WNTAKBA":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?i=ZABk3PZiYpw:AucFETuarTo:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn5@2020_1/2020/09/04/17-11-22-229_04f0f50c8d7d79f6.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/uproxx/features/~4/ZABk3PZiYpw":null},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1599239462320},{"createdTime":"2020-09-05 01:11:02","updatedTime":"2020-09-05 01:11:02","title":"A ‘Da 5 Bloods’ Actor Has A Heartbreaking Story About Working Alongside Chadwick Boseman","link":"https://uproxx.com/?p=402535637","description":"\t<div class=\"featured-image\">\n\t\t<figure class=\"post-thumbnail\">\n\t\t\t<div class=\"upx-component upx-image\"><div class=\"image-holder\"><img width=\"1024\" height=\"449\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/da-5-bloods-boseman-wide.jpeg?w=1024&#38;h=449&#38;crop=1\" class=\"attachment-article-featured size-article-featured skip-lazy\" alt=\"\" loading=\"lazy\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/da-5-bloods-boseman-wide.jpeg 1024w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/da-5-bloods-boseman-wide.jpeg?resize=300,132 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/da-5-bloods-boseman-wide.jpeg?resize=650,285 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/da-5-bloods-boseman-wide.jpeg?resize=768,337 768w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 640px) calc(100vw - 20px), (max-width: 1024px) calc(100vw - 40px), (min-width: 1025px) 1024px, 1024px\" /></div></div><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Netflix</span></figcaption>\t\t</figure>\n\t</div>\n\t<p>The last Chadwick Boseman movie released before <a href=\"https://uproxx.com/movies/chadwick-boseman-dead/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">his death</a> was <em>Da 5 Bloods</em>, Spike Lee’s reliably ambitious take on the Vietnam War genre. Boseman played one of the titular “Bloods,” a group of veterans who planted caches of money all over the war-torn country, with plans to retrieve it decades later. But his character, known as “Stormin’ Norm,” is only seen in flashbacks, being the only one to die during the war — a touch that’s gained unintended resonance after his untimely death. It seems Boseman kept his colon cancer a secret from almost the entire industry — to the point that one of his <em>Da 5 Bloods</em> co-stars misjudged his behavior as arrogance, when it certainly was not.</p>\n<p>The actor is Clarke Peters, perhaps best known as an alum of both <em>The Wire</em> (as intelligence expert Lester Freamon) and <em>Treme</em>. He played Otis, perhaps the calmest of the quintet, who reunites with his old Vietnamese girlfriend, and the daughter he didn’t know he had. But while making the movie, Peters admitted, on a recent interview with <em>Good Morning Britain</em> (<a href=\"https://ew.com/movies/clarke-peters-regrets-judging-chadwick-boseman-da-5-bloods/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">as caught by <em>Entertainment Weekly</em></a>), he didn’t get along as well with Boseman as he wished he’d had, especially once he learned about his condition. (You can watch the interview below.)</p>\n<div class=\"iframe-holder\">\n<blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet\" data-width=\"500\" data-dnt=\"true\">\n<p lang=\"en\" dir=\"ltr\">We all can learn a lesson in this&#8230; <a href=\"https://t.co/1LyQ67nSJ0\">pic.twitter.com/1LyQ67nSJ0</a></p>\n<p>&#8212; Loni Love (@LoniLove) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/LoniLove/status/1300855409217957888?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">September 1, 2020</a></p></blockquote>\n<p><script async src=\"https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script></div>\n<p>&#8220;I have to say with a little bit of regret that I probably wasn’t the most altruistic in that environment, but hindsight teaches us a lot of things,” Peters said on the show. &#8220;What I&#8217;m addressing is, basically, my wife asked what Chadwick was like. I was really excited to work with him. I said, &#8216;I think he&#8217;s a little bit precious.&#8217; And she said, &#8216;Why?&#8217; And I said, &#8216;Because he&#8217;s surrounded by people who are fawning over him.&#8217; He has a Chinese practitioner, who is massaging his back when he walks off set. He has a makeup lady massaging his feet. His girlfriend is there holding his hand.</p>\n<p>&#8220;And I&#8217;m thinking maybe the <em>Black Panther</em> thing went to his head.&#8221;</p>\n<p>It hadn’t. Boseman wasn’t acting princely; he was, Peters and everyone now knows, battling an illness that would soon take his life. “I regret even having those thoughts because they were really looking after him,” Peters said, choking back tears.</p>\n<p>It’s a heartbreaking reminder that Boseman kept his illness very close to the chest, right up to the end. There’s still one more Boseman film left to be released: <em>Ma Rainey’s Black Bottom</em>, which Netflix will drop later this year.</p>\n<p>(Via <em><a href=\"https://ew.com/movies/clarke-peters-regrets-judging-chadwick-boseman-da-5-bloods/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">EW</a></em>)</p>\n<div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?a=ek8Z8-bXL7g:i7QHwjChEvQ:qj6IDK7rITs\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?d=qj6IDK7rITs\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?a=ek8Z8-bXL7g:i7QHwjChEvQ:V_sGLiPBpWU\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?i=ek8Z8-bXL7g:i7QHwjChEvQ:V_sGLiPBpWU\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?a=ek8Z8-bXL7g:i7QHwjChEvQ:gIN9vFwOqvQ\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?i=ek8Z8-bXL7g:i7QHwjChEvQ:gIN9vFwOqvQ\" border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/uproxx/features/~4/ek8Z8-bXL7g\" +0000","feedId":6617,"bgimg":"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/da-5-bloods-boseman-wide.jpeg?w=1024&h=449&crop=1","linkMd5":"8b03d423a1ad224b3635b1739f0ecf57","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn46@2020_6/2020/09/04/17-11-02-693_bb8e58b8489917f0.webp","destWidth":1024,"destHeight":449,"sourceBytes":102020,"destBytes":102020,"author":"matthewprigge","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/da-5-bloods-boseman-wide.jpeg?w=1024&h=449&crop=1":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn46@2020_6/2020/09/04/17-11-02-693_bb8e58b8489917f0.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn89@2020_5/2020/09/04/17-11-02-428_c8fa5e32ae89b18f.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?i=ek8Z8-bXL7g:i7QHwjChEvQ:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn68@2020_4/2020/09/04/17-11-20-499_5b78ee1206684a0b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn45@2020_2/2020/09/04/17-11-18-942_f1234b5e3acb72a6.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?d=7Q72WNTAKBA":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?i=ek8Z8-bXL7g:i7QHwjChEvQ:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn44@2020_4/2020/09/04/17-11-19-551_258b139eb5e3d386.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/uproxx/features/~4/ek8Z8-bXL7g":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn36@2020_4/2020/09/04/17-11-16-451_da56671a4c81c4c0.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1599239462318},{"createdTime":"2020-09-05 01:11:02","updatedTime":"2020-09-05 01:11:02","title":"‘Mission: Impossible 7’ Is Now Stirring Up Controversy In Norway Over The Use Of Cruise Ships","link":"https://uproxx.com/?p=402534745","description":"\t<div class=\"featured-image\">\n\t\t<figure class=\"post-thumbnail\">\n\t\t\t<div class=\"upx-component upx-image\"><div class=\"image-holder\"><img width=\"1600\" height=\"660\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/tom-cruise-mission.jpg?w=1600&#38;h=660&#38;crop=1\" class=\"attachment-article-featured size-article-featured skip-lazy\" alt=\"\" loading=\"lazy\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/tom-cruise-mission.jpg?resize=1200,495 1200w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/tom-cruise-mission.jpg?resize=1600,660 1600w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 640px) calc(100vw - 20px), (max-width: 1024px) calc(100vw - 40px), (min-width: 1025px) 1024px, 1024px\" /></div></div><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">PARAMOUNT</span></figcaption>\t\t</figure>\n\t</div>\n\t<p>Another week, and another controversy for the <em><a href=\"https://uproxx.com/tag/mission-impossible-7/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Mission: Impossible 7</a></em> production as it pushes through Europe to completion.</p>\n<p>This time, the <a href=\"https://uproxx.com/topic/tom-cruise/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Tom Cruise</a> spy thriller finds itself in hot water after renting a pair of cruise ships in Norway. According to reports, at least one of the boats will serve as a &#8220;hotel-ship&#8221; for the cast and crew, but there is no official confirmation on their intended use. However, the more concerning issue is that the production is allegedly violating the Norwegian Immigration act by using the ships&#8217; underpaid Filipino crews. The move has put Cruise and the filmmaking team in the crosshairs of two local labor unions. </p>\n<p>Via <a href=\"https://variety.com/2020/film/global/tom-cruise-mission-impossible-norway-1234756626/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"><em>Variety</em></a>:</p>\n<blockquote><p>“It is completely unsustainable that it should be possible to only dock a boat with a wage level down to NOK 29 [$3.30] per hour,” union leader Johnny Hansen told the Norwegian Seamen’s Association.</p>\n<p>“It is not okay to use a ship that is to go in international shipping as a hotel in Stryn, close your eyes, and hope no one will find out that the employees are not close to the pay and working conditions that are statutory,” Fellesforbund leader Jørn Eggum told Verdens Gang.</p></blockquote>\n<p>Back in July, Cruise personally <a href=\"https://uproxx.com/movies/tom-cruise-mission-impossible-7-norway-resume-filming/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">called Norway&#8217;s Culture Minister</a> in an effort to jumpstart <em>Mission: Impossible 7</em>&#8216;s paused production as quickly as possible, so it remains to be seen whether this controversy will cause friction with government officials after allowing the film into the European country. The labor issue also arrives on the heels of trouble in Poland where the production faced criticism over its plan to blow up a bridge. Media headlines claimed the bridge scheduled to be detonated was a &#8220;<a href=\"https://uproxx.com/movies/christopher-mcquarrie-mission-impossible-7-bridge-poland/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">national monument</a>,&#8221; but director Ralph McQuarrie set the record straight in an open letter. According to McQuarrie, the bridge had no historic value, and local officials were enthusiastic about the production doing the local economy a favor by removing it, so a new one could be built to increase tourism.</p>\n<p>(Via <a href=\"https://variety.com/2020/film/global/tom-cruise-mission-impossible-norway-1234756626/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"><em>Variety</em></a>)</p>\n<div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?a=2D-NV_sVYFk:l8haaHvARAw:qj6IDK7rITs\"><img 2020 16:53:16 +0000","feedId":6617,"bgimg":"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/tom-cruise-mission.jpg?w=1600&h=660&crop=1","linkMd5":"22052d2eb0cc3a3f8cb813a000c8067f","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn78@2020_2/2020/09/04/17-11-02-626_44b5682d7428b79a.webp","destWidth":1600,"destHeight":660,"sourceBytes":122620,"destBytes":122620,"author":"Mike Redmond","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/tom-cruise-mission.jpg?w=1600&h=660&crop=1":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn78@2020_2/2020/09/04/17-11-02-626_44b5682d7428b79a.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn89@2020_5/2020/09/04/17-11-02-428_c8fa5e32ae89b18f.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?i=2D-NV_sVYFk:l8haaHvARAw:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn81@2020_3/2020/09/04/17-11-21-399_3f3d39161b447605.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn45@2020_2/2020/09/04/17-11-18-942_f1234b5e3acb72a6.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?d=7Q72WNTAKBA":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?i=2D-NV_sVYFk:l8haaHvARAw:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn15@2020_4/2020/09/04/17-11-16-599_d7073c38be2e6728.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/uproxx/features/~4/2D-NV_sVYFk":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn12@2020_3/2020/09/04/17-11-17-913_21973c442b365eae.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1599239462318},{"createdTime":"2020-09-05 01:11:02","updatedTime":"2020-09-05 01:11:02","title":"Ken Jennings Will Appear On New ‘Jeopardy!’ Episodes But Alex Trebek Is Still Hosting","link":"https://uproxx.com/?p=402537219","description":"\t<div class=\"featured-image\">\n\t\t<figure class=\"post-thumbnail\">\n\t\t\t<div class=\"upx-component upx-image\"><div class=\"image-holder\"><img width=\"1024\" height=\"471\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/jenningstrophy1024.jpg?w=1024&#38;h=471&#38;crop=1\" class=\"attachment-article-featured size-article-featured skip-lazy\" alt=\"\" loading=\"lazy\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/jenningstrophy1024.jpg 1024w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/jenningstrophy1024.jpg?resize=300,138 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/jenningstrophy1024.jpg?resize=650,299 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/jenningstrophy1024.jpg?resize=768,353 768w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 640px) calc(100vw - 20px), (max-width: 1024px) calc(100vw - 40px), (min-width: 1025px) 1024px, 1024px\" /></div></div><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Getty Image</span></figcaption>\t\t</figure>\n\t</div>\n\t<p>After months on the shelf thanks to the still-ongoing coronavirus pandemic, <em><a href=\"https://uproxx.com/topic/jeopardy/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Jeopardy!</a></em> is <a href=\"https://uproxx.com/tv/jeopardy-return-date-season-37-alex-trebek/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">finally back to taping episodes</a>. The good news is that Alex Trebek is back at the helm of the show, as there was some concern that the legendary host may play it safe as he battles Stage IV pancreatic cancer.</p>\n<p>According to reports, Trebek is, indeed, back to hosting the show as its 37th season is set to start on September 14. But one new addition to this year is a much more prominent role for the greatest <em>Jeopardy!</em> player of all time, Ken Jennings. It may seem like it was years ago that the man with the longest <em>Jeopardy!</em> winning streak in show history bested James Holzhauer and Brad Rutter in the GOAT Tournament, but Trebek has been busy in the months since. </p>\n<p><a href=\"https://uproxx.com/gaming/ken-jennings-interview-trivia-game-half-truth-review/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">He released a board game</a>, for one, and now <a href=\"https://www.usatoday.com/story/entertainment/tv/2020/09/03/jeopardy-season-37-returns-soon-bring-ken-jennings-back/5704120002/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">according to USA Today</a> he will join the new season of <em>Jeopardy!</em></p>\n<blockquote><p>Champion Ken Jennings, who in January triumphed over James Holzhauer and Brad Rutter in &#8220;The Greatest of All Time&#8221; tournament, has been recruited as a consulting producer this season. He&#8217;ll &#8220;present his own special video categories, develop projects, assist with contestant outreach, and serve as a general ambassador for the show, Sony said. (His first video category airs Sept. 15.)</p></blockquote>\n<p>The show&#8217;s Twitter account shared the news on Thursday as well, including its customary hype video. </p>\n<div class=\"iframe-holder\">\n<blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet\" data-width=\"500\" data-dnt=\"true\">\n<p lang=\"en\" dir=\"ltr\"><a href=\"https://twitter.com/hashtag/Jeopardy37?src=hash&#38;ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">#Jeopardy37</a> starts September 14 with some exciting changes!</p>\n<p>Mic check, one, two. Can you hear us, <a href=\"https://twitter.com/KenJennings?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">@KenJennings</a>? <a href=\"https://t.co/ojO2By0AeH\">pic.twitter.com/ojO2By0AeH</a></p>\n<p>&#8212; Jeopardy! Returns 9/14! (@Jeopardy) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/Jeopardy/status/1301550521208233985?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">September 3, 2020</a></p></blockquote>\n<p><script async src=\"https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script></div>\n<p>The USA Today piece has some other fun facts about how they brought Jeopardy! back in a world where social distancing is paramount, including a very visual reminder in the fact that contestants will be more spaced out on the set. But the good news is the show is coming back, and so is Trebek. Anything after that, including the Jeopardy! GOAT&#8217;s presence on the show, is just a very impressive bonus. </p>\n<p>[via <a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.usatoday.com/story/entertainment/tv/2020/09/03/jeopardy-season-37-returns-soon-bring-ken-jennings-back/5704120002/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">USA Today</a>]</p>\n<div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?a=EtWgcAFCXW8:3SxPVt5cKAM:qj6IDK7rITs\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?i=EtWgcAFCXW8:3SxPVt5cKAM:V_sGLiPBpWU\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?a=EtWgcAFCXW8:3SxPVt5cKAM:yIl2AUoC8zA\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?d=yIl2AUoC8zA\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?a=EtWgcAFCXW8:3SxPVt5cKAM:7Q72WNTAKBA\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?d=7Q72WNTAKBA\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?a=EtWgcAFCXW8:3SxPVt5cKAM:gIN9vFwOqvQ\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?i=EtWgcAFCXW8:3SxPVt5cKAM:gIN9vFwOqvQ\" border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/uproxx/features/~4/EtWgcAFCXW8\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Fri, 04 Sep 2020 00:14:39 +0000","feedId":6617,"bgimg":"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/jenningstrophy1024.jpg?w=1024&h=471&crop=1","linkMd5":"de3d397bd2a02c477f98c53488495155","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn85@2020_5/2020/09/04/17-11-02-524_e892254bb1bd004c.webp","destWidth":1024,"destHeight":471,"sourceBytes":26980,"destBytes":26980,"author":"Ryan Nagelhout","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/jenningstrophy1024.jpg?w=1024&h=471&crop=1":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn85@2020_5/2020/09/04/17-11-02-524_e892254bb1bd004c.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn89@2020_5/2020/09/04/17-11-02-428_c8fa5e32ae89b18f.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?i=EtWgcAFCXW8:3SxPVt5cKAM:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn29@2020_4/2020/09/04/17-11-22-453_7a9c8c2b81c903b9.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn45@2020_2/2020/09/04/17-11-18-942_f1234b5e3acb72a6.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?d=7Q72WNTAKBA":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?i=EtWgcAFCXW8:3SxPVt5cKAM:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn20@2020_5/2020/09/04/17-11-17-932_e3afad44e2d3a223.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/uproxx/features/~4/EtWgcAFCXW8":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn43@2020_5/2020/09/04/17-11-17-964_0f9fa87c43376c5e.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1599239462308},{"createdTime":"2020-09-05 01:11:02","updatedTime":"2020-09-05 01:11:02","title":"Tasting Notes For Maker’s Mark Wood Finishing Series 2020 Release","link":"https://uproxx.com/?p=402534604","description":"\t<div class=\"featured-image\">\n\t\t<figure class=\"post-thumbnail\">\n\t\t\t<div class=\"upx-component upx-image\"><div class=\"image-holder\"><img width=\"1600\" height=\"495\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/makers-tfeat-uproxx.jpg?w=1600&#38;h=495&#38;crop=1\" class=\"attachment-article-featured size-article-featured skip-lazy\" alt=\"\" loading=\"lazy\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/makers-tfeat-uproxx.jpg 1600w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/makers-tfeat-uproxx.jpg?resize=300,93 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/makers-tfeat-uproxx.jpg?resize=650,201 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/makers-tfeat-uproxx.jpg?resize=768,238 768w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/makers-tfeat-uproxx.jpg?resize=1024,317 1024w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/makers-tfeat-uproxx.jpg?resize=1536,475 1536w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 640px) calc(100vw - 20px), (max-width: 1024px) calc(100vw - 40px), (min-width: 1025px) 1024px, 1024px\" /></div></div><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">iStock/Maker&#039;s Mark/Uproxx</span></figcaption>\t\t</figure>\n\t</div>\n\t<p>When it comes to gateway <a href=\"https://uproxx.com/life/tasting-noted-2020-four-roses-limited-edition/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">bourbons</a>, it’s hard to top the original Maker’s Mark. It’s full of vanilla, caramel, and corn-sweetness and is effortlessly easy to sip. But, the best thing about starting with <a href=\"https://uproxx.com/life/bourbons-for-summer-and-fall/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">bourbon</a> from the Loretto, Kentucky-based <a href=\"https://uproxx.com/life/eh-taylor-jr-single-barrel-tasting/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">distillery</a> is the fact that you can step up to its other releases when your palate becomes a little more nuanced. </p>\n<p>You can’t go wrong with its Maker’s Mark 46. But the true <a href=\"https://uproxx.com/life/most-underrated-bourbons-2020/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">bourbon</a> aficionados always eagerly await their second release, Maker’ Mark 2020 Limited Release. This is the second offering from its Wood Finishing series. Last year, the brand launched Stave Profile RC6. It was full of toasted vanilla, sweet caramel, and mouth-watering fruit flavors. This year, at the same time the brand is celebrating the 10th anniversary of Maker’s 46, it’s making this new release available. </p>\n<p>You might be unfamiliar with the term “wood finishing.” In this scenario, it refers to Maker&#8217;s proprietary stave finishing process. After full maturation, cask strength bourbon is filled into barrels containing specifically designed wooden staves. Then, those barrels are rested in the brand’s limestone bourbon cellar. The result is a unique flavor profile created by the well-aged whiskey and the staves interacting together. </p>\n<p>Available now nationwide, Maker’s Mark 2020 Limited Release has a suggested retail price of $59.99 &#8212; a great price for what&#8217;s in the bottle. It won’t be available for long, so you better get your hands on a bottle while you can. </p>\n<h3>Maker’s Mark 2020 Limited Release</h3>\n<figure id=\"402534612\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-402534612\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/WFS2020-Bridge.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/WFS2020-Bridge.jpg 4128w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/WFS2020-Bridge.jpg?resize=300,200 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/WFS2020-Bridge.jpg?resize=650,433 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/WFS2020-Bridge.jpg?resize=768,512 768w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/WFS2020-Bridge.jpg?resize=1024,683 1024w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/WFS2020-Bridge.jpg?resize=1536,1024 1536w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/WFS2020-Bridge.jpg?resize=2048,1365 2048w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/WFS2020-Bridge.jpg?resize=150,100 150w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/WFS2020-Bridge.jpg?resize=1920,1280 1920w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 4128px) 100vw, 4128px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Maker</span></figcaption></figure>\n<p><strong>ABV: </strong>55.4%<br />\n<strong>Price:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.makersmark.com/wood-finishing-series-2020-release\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">$59.99</a></p>\n<p><strong>The Story:</strong></p>\n<p>Proving that you need to compare both offerings, last year’s expression was created to be high in baking spices and fruity flavors. This year, the emphasis was richer, more dessert-like flavors. That’s because the 2020 version doesn’t use the same stave styles from the previous year. They selected the two specific staves to impart the flavors of vanilla and caramel. They didn’t figure out how to do this overnight. It took more than a year of experimenting before they created the perfect balance. One stave, made from French oak, was cooked on medium heat before toasting. The other stave was made from American oak. It was cooked on low heat for an extended period of time. The vast difference in the flavor of the two offerings makes us wonder what we’re in store for next fall. </p>\n<p><strong>Tasting Notes:</strong></p>\n<p>Like all great bourbon sipping sessions, it all starts with the nosing. You’d be remiss if you took a sip without first savoring the aromas of rich, toasted oak, sweet cream, and salted caramel. The first sip brings forth flavors of vanilla beans, sticky toffee pudding, and caramelized sugar with a subtle nutty backbone. The finish is long, dry, and ripe with more vanilla and caramel that ends with a subtle flourish of cinnamon. </p>\n<p><strong>Bottom Line:</strong></p>\n<p>The folks at Maker’s Mark spent a long time perfecting this whiskey. You should do it justice by pouring it over a few ice cubes and sipping it slowly while you watch the world go by around you. Its September launch is well-timed because this will be your go-to autumnal dram.</p>\n<div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?a=iNw7j_MNYg0:AlINTS2ftgE:qj6IDK7rITs\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?d=qj6IDK7rITs\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?a=iNw7j_MNYg0:AlINTS2ftgE:V_sGLiPBpWU\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?i=iNw7j_MNYg0:AlINTS2ftgE:V_sGLiPBpWU\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?a=iNw7j_MNYg0:AlINTS2ftgE:7Q72WNTAKBA\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/uproxx/features?d=7Q72WNTAKBA\" 01:11:02","updatedTime":"2020-09-05 01:11:02","title":"SNX DLX: Featuring The Jordan 1 Bio Hack, Jaden Smith’s New Balances, And A Rhude Puma Collab","link":"https://uproxx.com/?p=402534725","description":"\t<div class=\"featured-image\">\n\t\t<figure class=\"post-thumbnail\">\n\t\t\t<div class=\"upx-component upx-image\"><div 1024px, 1024px\" /></div></div><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Puma/Nike/New Balance/Uproxx</span></figcaption>\t\t</figure>\n\t</div>\n\t<p>Hello September! We&#8217;re now officially in the last days of summer and even if it&#8217;s still unseasonably warm outside in some parts of the county, it&#8217;s time to start seriously thinking about <a title=\"\" href=\"https://uproxx.com/style/stich-gawd-interview/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">layering up</a>. We got you in that department. </p>\n<p>But before we dive into this week&#8217;s SNX DLX, we should probably mention that <a title=\"\" href=\"https://uproxx.com/style/where-to-buy-sean-wotherspoon-adidas-superearth-superstar-union-jordan-4-guava/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">one of our picks from last week</a>, the Adidas YEEZY 700 V3 Arzareth, was postponed (along with a lot of other Adidas releases) as a company-wide call for justice over the shooting of Jacob Blake in Kenosha, Wisconsin. </p>\n<p>The Arzareth&#8217;s adjusted launch date was September 1st. And the sneaker is still available over at Yeezy Supply. Still, it didn&#8217;t feel right to include the sneaker in this week&#8217;s lineup again. This week we&#8217;ve got new releases from New Balance, Adidas, a Dunk-inspired Air Jordan 1, and a linkup between Puma and streetwear label Rhude. Let&#8217;s dive in!</p>\n<h3>Jaden Smith x New Balance Vision Racer Wavy White</h3>\n<figure id=\"402534788\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-402534788\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/nicekicks.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/nicekicks.jpg 1280w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/nicekicks.jpg?resize=300,200 300w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/nicekicks.jpg?resize=650,434 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/nicekicks.jpg?resize=768,512 768w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/nicekicks.jpg?resize=1024,683 1024w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/nicekicks.jpg?resize=150,100 150w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 1280px) 100vw, 1280px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Nice Kicks</span></figcaption></figure>\n<p>When Jaden Smith decided to add “sneaker designer” to his ever-growing resume, many a sneakerhead rolled their eyes at the prospect of yet another celebrity dabbler invading the space. But, I don’t know. I think Jaden’s work with New Balance is pretty dope. The Vision Racer is a mashup of New Balance’s 1700 and X-Racer silhouettes and features an upper of mixed mesh and suede, reflective detailing along the New Balance “N,” and a mix of recycled and post-consumer plastic construction throughout.</p>\n<p>Did we mention this sneaker is also fully vegan-friendly? You can roll your eyes, but then fix them to the fact that our planet is on fire. Who wouldn’t want a vegan semi-sustainable sneaker in 2020?</p>\n<p>The Jaden Smith x New Balance Vision Racer Wavy White is out now for a retail price of $150. Pick up a pair at the <a title=\"\" href=\"https://shopnicekicks.com/collections/recent-launch/products/new-balance-x-jaden-smith-vision-racer-mens-lifestyle-shoe-white-blue-yellow#Image15217503174705\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Nice Kicks online store</a>. </p>\n<figure id=\"402534787\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-402534787\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/nicekicks2.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/nicekicks2.jpg 1280w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/nicekicks2.jpg?resize=150,100 150w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 1280px) 100vw, 1280px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Nice Kicks</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3>Rhude x PUMA Cell King</h3>\n<figure id=\"402534786\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-402534786\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Puma.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Puma.jpg 2000w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Puma.jpg?resize=768,768 768w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Puma.jpg?resize=1024,1024 1024w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Puma.jpg?resize=1536,1536 1536w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Puma.jpg?resize=1920,1920 1920w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Puma.jpg?resize=1472,1472 1472w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Puma.jpg?resize=1104,1104 1104w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Puma.jpg?resize=912,912 912w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Puma.jpg?resize=550,550 550w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Puma.jpg?resize=470,470 470w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 2000px) 100vw, 2000px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Puma</span></figcaption></figure>\n<p>PUMA has linked up yet again with luxury streetwear label Rhude for a Frankensteinian mashup of their King football boot and their CELL running sneaker. The result has a distinctive old-world quality about it, like the kind of shoe you’d need to entrust a cobbler with to maintain.</p>\n<p> The Cell King features a quilted synthetic leather upper, an EVA midsole with CELL cushioning, asymmetrical cushion windows, and a fold-over tongue. </p>\n<p>The Rhude x PUMA Cell King is set to drop on September 5th for a retail price of $150. Pick up a pair at the <a title=\"\" href=\"https://us.puma.com/en/us/pd/puma-x-rhude-cell-king-mens-sneakers/371389.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">PUMA webstore</a>. </p>\n<figure id=\"402534785\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-402534785\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Puma2.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Puma</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3>Air Jordan 1 Bio Hack/ Baroque Brown</h3>\n<figure id=\"402534780\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-402534780\" src=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/air-jordan-1-baroque-brown-release-date-1.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" srcset=\"https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/air-jordan-1-baroque-brown-release-date-1.jpg 1920w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/air-jordan-1-baroque-brown-release-date-1.jpg?resize=650,345 650w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/air-jordan-1-baroque-brown-release-date-1.jpg?resize=768,408 768w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/air-jordan-1-baroque-brown-release-date-1.jpg?resize=1024,544 1024w, https://uproxx.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/air-jordan-1-baroque-brown-release-date-1.jpg?resize=1536,816 1536w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 1920px) 100vw, 1920px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Nike</span></figcaption></figure>\n<p>A modern reinterpretation and remix of UNDEFEATED’s much-beloved 2005 Nike SB Dunk Hi, this Air Jordan in “Baroque Brown” is designed to resemble that original sneaker, which still sells on the aftermarket for prices above $1000. And you know what? We kind of like these more. Maybe…</p>\n<p>Featuring a color-block upper, the Air Jordan 1 Bio Hack sports leather construction with soft suede overlays, an embroidered tongue, and a silver wrap around swoosh. Picking up a pair is a no brainer this week, so set yourself up for disappointment if you can’t manage to cop a pair. </p>\n<p>The Air Jordan 1 Bio Hack is set to drop on September 4th for a retail price of $170. Pick up a pair through the <a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.nike.com/launch/t/air-jordan-1-baroque-brown-racer-pink\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Nike SNKRS app</a> or select Nike retailers. </p>\n<figure id=\"402534779\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full wp-image-402534779\" class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Nike</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3>Nike Dunk Low Disrupt</h3>\n<figure id=\"402534773\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"wp-media-credit\">Nike</span></figcaption></figure>\n<p>A Dunk Low with a more pronounced and rounded-off shape, the Dunk Low Disrupt updates the Dunk Low silhouette with a platform stance and exaggerated proportions like extra dimension around the outsole, a padded collar, and the added upper panels. </p>\n<p>While the sneaker is WMNS sized, Nike is launching the sneaker in an extended size run. We say, go full unisex Nike. What are you scared of?</p>\n<p>The Nike Dunk Low Disrupt is set to drop on September 4th for a retail price of $110. class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Yeezy Supply</span></figcaption></figure>\n<p>Full disclosure — I don’t love these. The only reason I’m including them at all is that despite the fact that this week has some truly great releases, it’s also a little light on variety. If you love the YEEZY SLIDEs, which many do, you’ll be pleased to know that the sandal — that word makes us shudder — will be dropping in a new Core and Soot colorway, and the original Bone colorway will be receiving a restock. </p>\n<p>How long before Ye straight up names one of his sandals colorways “Jesus?” </p>\n<p>The Adidas YEEZY SLIDE is set to drop on September 4th for a retail price of $55. Pick up a pair through the <a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.adidas.com/us/yeezy\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Adidas online store</a> and <a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.yeezysupply.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">YEEZY Supply</a>.</p>\n<figure id=\"402534771\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><img class=\"size-full aesthetic. </p>\n<p>The Anti Social Social Club BAPE Fall 2020 collection is set to drop on September 4th at the <a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.antisocialsocialclub.com/\" target=\"_blank\" 1500px\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"><span class=\"wp-media-credit\">Supreme</span></figcaption></figure>\n<p>If you’re looking for some fresh Supreme, you’re not going to want to miss their latest Fall/Winter drop with Nike. Consisting of a reversible anorak with matching pants, sweatshirts, sweaters, and polo shirts, this new collection is dressed in six alternate colorways throughout the entire line, which we appreciate as it gives the collection a more custom feel. </p>\n<p>This collection is meant to be matched, the crewnecks and sweat shorts are constructed from the same cotton fleece and twill material and the reversible pants and Anorak both feature nylon construction with a semi-transparent makeup, so you’re probably not going to dig on this collection if you’re tired of the whole athleisure aesthetic. </p>\n<p>The Nike Supreme Fall/Winter 2020 Collection is set to drop on September 3rd. Shop the capsule at the <a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.supremenewyork.com/shop\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Supreme online store.</a> </p>\n<figure id=\"402534766\" class=\"wp-media-credit\">Supreme</span></figcaption></figure>\n<h3>Chinatown Market Hoodie Drop/ Grateful Dead Croc</h3>\n<div class=\"embed-holder\" style=\"--embed-ratio:100%;\"><iframe width=\"320\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://www.instagram.com/p/CEnUU7_h0J0/embed/\" frameborder=\"0\"></iframe></div>\n<p>Chinatown Market has just dropped two psychedelic hoodie sweaters featuring minimalist Chinatown Market university-inspired branding. Doubling down on the whole ‘60s psychedelia vibe, Chinatown Market has also announced a surprise drop of their Grateful Dead Crocs, which also features a tie-dye all-over print and dancing bear medallions. </p>\n<p>We’re not down for the Crocs, but since the Grateful Dead are enjoying a streetwear renaissance, we felt it was worth mentioning. </p>\n<p>The Chinatown Market Hoodies and Grateful Dead Crocs are out now. The Hoodies are shoppable at the <a title=\"\" href=\"https://thechinatownmarket.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Chinatown Market online store</a> and the Crocs are being sold at the <a title=\"\" href=\"https://www.crocs.com/grateful-dead.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Croc online store</a>. </p>\n<div class=\"embed-holder\"
